tool.name: Loc_Type

param.name: in_file
param.dialogReference: You may use the dropdown to choose a <p_> feature Layer from the map TOC, or use the browse button to choose a feature Class from the GDB.

param.name: typeBox
param.expression: Tag Deployed | Biopsy Sample | Argos Pass | FastLoc GPS | Photo ID | Derived
param.dialogReference: Checked types will be preserved, UN-checked types will be filtered.

param.name: newFields
param.displayname: Don't create Log file, add filter column instead
param.dialogReference: By default, tools will output a new filtered feature class and a _log with the locations that were filtered. Check this box if you prefer to have the filter output include all of the input locations, with filter info appended to new "Filter Name" and "Filter Parameters" columns.

tool.usage:
1) The default selections are "Tag Deployed", "Biopsy Sample" and "Argos Pass". Use caution when you're filtering ADB tags!

2) Most "Tag Deployed" locations are also "Biopsy Sample" as they are simultaneous events in the field; If you uncheck "Biopsy Sample" while "Tag Deployed" is checked, ONLY the samples that were collected post-deployment will be filtered.
